Provide proofs to establish the following claims:

a. $\ph\conj\psi\provesp\psi\conj\ph$

b. $\provesp \neg(\ph\conj\neg\ph)$

c. $\provesp \ph\vee\neg\ph$

d. $\neg\ph\provesp\ph\imp\psi$

e. $\ph\provesp\ph\imp\psi$

f. $\ph, \neg\psi\provesp\neg(\ph\imp\psi)$

g. $\neg(\ph\vee\psi)\provesp\neg\ph\conj\neg\psi$

h. $\neg(\ph\conj\psi)\provesp\neg\ph\disj\neg\psi$
